name: Healing Cloud
description:
This is my first game inspired by YouTube video "Rainbow Appears to Pour Out of the Cloud". Basically, in this game, people in depression can be aggressive, but the cloud with RAINBOW POWER can always bring happiness to them and help them get better! 

Press WASD to move, Space to jump, Q to switch modes. Use mouse clicks to shoot.

This is a little survival game where the player plays the role of a healing cloud, absorbing energy from the sun and healing depressed people while avoiding their attacks! 

Enjoy it!
